section.title: Page flows: implementation details
section.para: This section covers how the particular elements that govern page flow are implemented in the application.

section.title: Registering
section.para: Registering in is basically the first step a user takes in the application. Have a look at a piece of code from \includes\index\
When the button is hit the goToRegister method is evoked and the START_REGISTER_EVENT is raised. These action display the registration form that is included from \includes\register.xhtml.
The <a4j:commandLink> displays the link to the registration form and invokes the goToRegister method.
When all fields are filled out with correct values the register(user) is triggered and a new user is set.
